## CssClassesEditPopup interface

Css classes for edit popup

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CssClassesEditPopup 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [optionChecked](./select.cssclasseseditpopup.optionchecked.md) | string | Css class used as icons indicating that option is selected (only when multiple) |
|  [optionItemDiv](./select.cssclasseseditpopup.optionitemdiv.md) | string | Css class applied to each option div |
|  [optionItemTextDiv](./select.cssclasseseditpopup.optionitemtextdiv.md) | string | Css class applied to each option text div |
|  [popupDiv](./select.cssclasseseditpopup.popupdiv.md) | string | Css class applied directly to css popup |
